description: Don’t let a warm shower be one of the things you have to do without when you're camping. Packing down to about the size of a deck of cards and doubling as a dry bag, the Sea To Summit Pocket shower is a slice of civilization that you can fit in your pack. Great for washing off sandy toes after a day at the beach.Burly, polyurethane coated 70-denier ripstop nylon.Contoured showerhead provides a wide, even spray.Twist-on, twist-off operation is easy to use with one hand and adjusts the flow from a trickle to a proper shower.10L capacity provides a 7-8 minute shower.Doubles as a dry-sack when not on shower duty.D-rings and 6m of cord let you set the shower up for all campers big and small.Compact zippered case included.
name: Sea To Summit Pocket Shower
